title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.22 - Sledding, skating, skiing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.22 - Sledding, skating, skiing

State Regulations

Skating, sledding, walking or going upon any ice, or
snowshoe, or ski, motorized or otherwise, or towing persons on skis, sleds, or
skates within the parkway system, is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
